statements: SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE num_guests > 5 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_time FROM bookings WHERE tour_id = 101 ORDER BY reservation_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND num_guests <= 3;
SELECT customer_name, num_guests FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT booking_date, reservation_time FROM bookings WHERE num_guests > 5 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, num_guests FROM bookings WHERE tour_id = 1002 AND booking_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY num_guests ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM bookings WHERE reservation_time < '13:00:00';
SELECT booking_id, num_guests, customer_name FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2023-06-01' AND '2023-08-31';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT booking_id, user_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT tour_name, tour_price FROM tours WHERE tour_location = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tour_name, tour_description, tour_price FROM tours ORDER BY tour_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT tour_name, tour_location FROM tours WHERE tour_price > 1000 ORDER BY tour_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(booking_date) FROM bookings GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM bookings INNER JOIN tours ON bookings.tour_id = tours.tour_id WHERE tour_location = 'Paris';
SELECT tour_name, COUNT(*) FROM tours INNER JOIN bookings ON tours.tour_id = bookings.tour_id WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed' GROUP BY tour_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT tour_name, tour_price FROM tours WHERE tour_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM bookings JOIN users ON bookings.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_phone IS NULL;
SELECT tour_name, tour_price FROM tours WHERE tour_price > 100.00;
SELECT booking_id, tour_name, user_name FROM bookings b JOIN tours t ON b.tour_id = t.tour_id JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM bookings;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, customer_name FROM bookings WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, tour_id FROM bookings WHERE tour_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM tours WHERE tour_price > 100.00;
SELECT reservation_id, booking_id, tour_id, reservation_date FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, tour_name, tour_price FROM customers INNER JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_name = bookings.customer_name INNER JOIN tours ON bookings.tour_id = tours.tour_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT tour_name, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM bookings INNER JOIN tours ON bookings.tour_id = tours.tour_id GROUP BY tour_name ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC, booking_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT booking_id, total_price, status FROM bookings WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, location FROM tours WHERE duration_hours > 2 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-09-15' ORDER BY reservation_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY booking_date DESC, booking_time ASC;
SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, tours.tour_name FROM users JOIN bookings ON users.user_id = bookings.user_id JOIN tours ON tours.tour_id = bookings.tour_id;
SELECT booking_id, user_id, booking_date, booking_time, total_price, status FROM bookings WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT booking_id, user_id, booking_date, booking_time, total_price, status FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT tours.tour_name, tours.location, COUNT(reservations.reservation_id) AS reservations_count FROM tours LEFT JOIN reservations ON tours.tour_id = reservations.tour_id GROUP BY tours.tour_name, tours.location ORDER BY reservations_count DESC;
